page.title: 08Greenacres and its area
page.content: {Greenacres} is a fairly large housing estate which is still in the process of development.{Delany} Homes are responsible for building the estate.The residents of the estate all seem to like the area in which they live though many of the parents would like to see a {playground} for their children as there is nothing at present except the school field.As well as young and middle aged parents there are single people and O.A.P's.The peace and quiet of the area seem to attract many people as the houses are set a long way from the main road. People had been {living in this area} from, the earliest 3 months(this was a new house)to 11 years.Most people had lived outside the area,and moved because either they wanted a larger
